sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import StarRatings from 'react-star-ratings'; import { FacebookShareButton, TwitterShareButton, WhatsappShareButton, } from 'react-share'; import { FaFacebook, FaTwitter, FaWhatsapp } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './ProductPage.css'; const product = { id: 1, name: 'Elegant Perfume', description: 'Experience elegance in every spritz with this luxurious fragrance.', price: 49.99, rating: 4.5, image: '/images/elegant-perfume.jpg', variants: [ { id: 2, name: 'Elegant Perfume - 50ml', price: 29.99, image: '/images/elegant-perfume-50ml.jpg', }, { id: 3, name: 'Elegant Perfume - 100ml', price: 49.99, image: '/images/elegant-perfume-100ml.jpg', }, { id: 4, name: 'Elegant Perfume - Limited Edition', price: 69.99, image: '/images/elegant-perfume-limited.jpg', }, ], reviews: [ { user: 'Alice', rating: 4, comment: 'Amazing scent!' }, { user: 'Bob', rating: 5, comment: 'Best perfume I ever bought!' }, { user: 'Claire', rating: 4.5, comment: 'Really luxurious and long-lasting.' }, ], }; const additionalProducts = [ { id: 5, name: 'Fresh Citrus Perfume', price: 39.99, image: '/images/fresh-citrus-perfume.jpg', }, { id: 6, name: 'Sweet Blossom Perfume', price: 45.99, image: '/images/sweet-blossom-perfume.jpg', }, { id: 7, name: 'Classic Wood Perfume', price: 49.99, image: '/images/classic-wood-perfume.jpg', }, ]; const ProductPage = () => { const shareUrl = window.location.href; return (

{product.name}

{product.description}

${product.price.toFixed(2)}

{product.rating} / 5

More Options

{product.variants.map((variant) => (

{variant.name}

${variant.price.toFixed(2)}

))}

Customer Reviews

{product.reviews.map((review, index) => (

{review.user}

{review.comment}

))}

More Products

{additionalProducts.map((product) => (

{product.name}

${product.price.toFixed(2)}

))}
); }; export default ProductPage;
